name: FTMTOKEN
description: FTMX is a Layer 2 blockchain built on Ethereum that uses the FTMX token as its native gas and governance asset. The network is designed to support decentralized applications with a focus on social media, creator monetization, and digital ownership. The FTMX token is used to pay transaction fees, participate in staking, vote on governance proposals, and enable direct on-chain payments between users and creators.
